name: Ruski
description:
A Comedy Filled , Cold-War Typing Game. ###PRE-ALPHA###  -Not all intended functions are implemented/refined

This Is my first start to finish game,  i'm using it as a springboard to help understand the process and just to make something  fun and actually see it through. Can't wait to refine and complete this so i may get to work on my many other ideas!

Thanks for the interest!

If you play this before release, PLEASE give me some input on:

 -If you find any bugs 

-What you like

 -What you don't like

-What you'd like to see 

These things will help me improve this the best i can!

CURRENT VERSION - 0.8.0

-Getting close to release!

#Upcoming Patches#

WIP -TYPETEST MODE (WPM & ACCURACY TEST)

-VERSIONING

-SCHEDULED EVENTS

-REFINED GAMEPLAY MECHANICS

-UNLOCKABLES & ARCADE MODE FOR INFINITE PLAY
